attributes.additional_details: BBC news reports that people held in G.Bay without charge are on hunger strike and being force fed against their will. We call on the UK and US governments to respect all people and not allow them to be violated and made to suffer pain by their jailors. Prisoners should be brought to trial quickly and freed or imprisoned according to the decision of an impartial justice system http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-27544904
